associatedUuid.description: UUID of resource to whome the event applies.

attempts.description: The number of times this notification has been attempted to be fulfilled.

created.description: A timestamp indicating when this notification was created in the notification store.

lastSent.description: A timestamp indicating the last time this notification was sent.

owner.description: The API user who owns this notification.

persistent.description: Whether this notification should stay active after it fires the first time.

responseCode.description: The response code from POSTing to the url or sending an email.

success.description: Whether this notification was sent successfully.

url.description: The url or email address that will be notified of the event.
